data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Potaro-Siparuni, Guyana.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Potaro-Siparuni, Guyana
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 1,744 believers in the state of Potaro-Siparuni to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Potaro-Siparuni, Guyana.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Please, teach the 1,744 believers in Potaro-Siparuni, Guyana how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Urdu people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Potaro-Siparuni to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Potaro-Siparuni, Guyana.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Potaro-Siparuni to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

location.name: Potaro-Siparuni
location.people_groups_list: Han Chinese, Cantonese, Macushi, Han Chinese, Hakka, Pemon, Taulipang, Sarnami Hindi
